alert.note: Alert for Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:31PM EDT until July 21 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTY... At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Effingham, or 10 miles northeast of Ossipee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway, Ossipee, Effingham, Tamworth, Wolfeboro, Madison, Freedom, Eaton and Tuftonboro. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
